images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing warm seas, colorful festivals, and lush nature.
AI-selected This seasonal image will depict the autumn experience in Thailand, focusing on the Loy Krathong festival, showcasing lanterns and celebrations.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and discounts related to the campaign, encouraging users to take action.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and discounts related to the campaign, encouraging users to take action.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and discounts related to the campaign, encouraging users to take action.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and trust throughout the email.
AI-selected This background pattern will enhance the overall festive and warm atmosphere of the email, aligning with the autumn theme.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and colorful, reflecting the beauty of autumn festivals
assetRequirements.content_context: A picturesque view of Thailand showcasing warm seas, autumn foliage, and festive celebrations.

assetRequirements.purpose: visual representation of autumn in Thailand
assetRequirements.visual_style: natural and serene, highlighting the lush landscapes
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of lush nature, warm beaches, and cultural festivals during the autumn season.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осеннюю сказку Таиланда с Kupibilet!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing warm seas, colorful festivals, and lush nature.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
